entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
